info.author: Allen B. Downey
info.name: ThinkBayes2
info.summary: Supporting code for the book Think Bayes 2e.
info.yanked_reason: Installing ThinkBayes2 with pip is no longer recommended. Instead, please use the instructions in the notebooks to download the latest version of thinkbayes2.py and import it. You don't have to install it as a package, and it is not recommended that you do.
